channel.title: repost on Emmanuella Rumanti
channel.description: Recent content in repost on Emmanuella Rumanti

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2024: First Blog Post
item.description: I’ve been selected as one of Google Summer of Code 2024’s contributors for OpenROAD, an electronic design automation (EDA) toolchain for digital integrated circuits design that deals with the VLSI design flow (RTL to GDSII). The program I am a part of, Open Source Research Experience 2024, requires that all contributors post blog posts about their work. My initial blog post can be found here: Building Unit Tests for OpenROAD: Towards better code coverage!

item.title: [Repost] Modular Origami
item.description:
Note: This is a post originally published on December 22, 2019 on my old site. It has been reposted here for archival purposes.

If a modular origami construction is a book of fiction, then it is an anthology of tales, not a novel.
